criteria.inclusion_criteria: Married women aged 25-40 years old; those diagnosed as infertility and PCOS; those diagnosed as Kidney deficiency syndrome; clear communication skills with hospital researchers, and normal hormonal test result range.

primary_outcome.prim_outcome: syndrome score;The clinical pregnancy rate;KL/c-kit/FOXO3a RNA and protein expression;
